head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BAILEY, JUDITH S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BAILEY, JUDITH S.

block.p: BAILEY-Judith S., 67, of Washington Township., Morris County, N.J. on October 17, 2000. Beloved wife of Holmes Bailey of Washington Township NJ. Surviving are: daughters Dr. Alison Bailey of Bloomington, IL, and Katherine Bailey, of Oregon City, OR. For information Cochran Funeral Home, 905 High Street, Hackettstown, NJ. 07840. Service on Sunday, November 19, at 4 PM at Christ Church in Short Hills, NJ.
